I'm looking for smarter investors & partners who have spotted the errors(*) shown here by CYPW and are interested in seeing this concept brought to fruition without all the gimmicks & hype e.g. a boat or other flashy applications. Just a Rankine Cycle engine running on heat and creating torque.

These people burned millions of dollars pursuing a false hope that never stood any real chance of succeeding as a commercial project.
